name: Crab - Evolution
description:
Welcome to Crab Evolution!
There's so much going on in the ocean that there's just no way we could know what's really going on down there. After thousands of years, we should have known what would happen if crabs started to mutate. It's time for you to combine crabs and discover just how crazy things are getting in the deep.

................................................
How to play
................................................

- Combine crabs of the same kind to discover new crabs
- Visit Dean's Crab shop to buy crabs when you need to.
- Discover new worlds as you discover new crabs
- Always keep at least one crab in newly discovered worlds so you can visit
- Play every day to maximize your earning power.

................................................
Cool Stuff
................................................
- Addictive Game Play
- Optimized for iPhone 4,4s,5,5s,6,and 6s
- Dozens of crabs waiting to be discovered
- Beautiful on iPad mini
- in-app purchase available to speed up game play
- relaxing jazz sound track and original graphics
